contents: 通过maxDate和minDate可以给组件指定最大和最小选择日期。

highlighted.content:
import Datepicker from 'kpc/components/datepicker';

<div>
    <Datepicker v-model="from" placeholder="开始日期"
        maxDate={{ self.get('to') }}
        minDate={{ new Date() }}
    /> ~
    <Datepicker v-model="to" placeholder="结束日期"
        minDate={{ self.get('from') }}
    />
    <br />
    <br />
    <Datepicker v-model="fromTime" placeholder="开始时间"
        type="datetime"
        maxDate={{ self.get('toTime') || new Date() }}
    /> ~
    <Datepicker v-model="toTime" placeholder="结束时间"
        type="datetime"
        minDate={{ self.get('fromTime') }}
        maxDate={{ new Date() }}
    />
</div>

import Intact from 'intact';
import template from './index.vdt';

export default class extends Intact {
    @Intact.template()
    static template = template;
}

<template>
    <div>
        <Datepicker v-model="from" placeholder="开始日期"
            :maxDate="to"
            :minDate="new Date()"
        /> ~
        <Datepicker v-model="to" placeholder="结束日期"
            :minDate="from"
        />
        <br />
        <br />
        <Datepicker v-model="fromTime" placeholder="开始时间"
            type="datetime"
            :maxDate="toTime || new Date()"
        /> ~
        <Datepicker v-model="toTime" placeholder="结束时间"
            type="datetime"
            :minDate="fromTime"
            :maxDate="new Date()"
        />
    </div>
</template>
<script>
import Datepicker from 'kpc/components/datepicker';

export default {
    components: {
        Datepicker
    },
    data() {
        return {
            "to": null,
            "from": null,
            "toTime": null,
            "fromTime": null
        }
    },
}
</script>

import React from 'react';
import Datepicker from 'kpc/components/datepicker';

export default class Demo extends React.Component {
    constructor(props) {
        super(props);
        this.state = {};
    }

    render() {
        return (
            <div>
                <Datepicker value={this.state.from} on$change-value={(c, from) => this.setState({from})} placeholder="开始日期"
                    maxDate={this.state.to}
                    minDate={new Date()}
                /> ~
                <Datepicker value={this.state.to} on$change-value={(c, to) => this.setState({to})} placeholder="结束日期"
                    minDate={this.state.from}
                />
                <br />
                <br />
                <Datepicker value={this.state.fromTime} on$change-value={(c, fromTime) => this.setState({fromTime})} placeholder="开始时间"
                    type="datetime"
                    maxDate={this.state.toTime || new Date()}
                /> ~
                <Datepicker value={this.state.toTime} on$change-value={(c, toTime) => this.setState({toTime})} placeholder="结束时间"
                    type="datetime"
                    minDate={this.state.fromTime}
                    maxDate={new Date()}
                />
            </div>
        )
    }
}
